title: WllRun 2 Packs Star Wars Death Star Silicone Ice Cube Mold Tray,Chocolate Maker Tools,Ice Ball Shape for Drinks(Blue)
features: 【Easy to Clean,Easy to Release】 Divide it into two parts and then clean them separately. It is suitable for cleaning with a dishwasher. Made of flexible silicone, very easy to remove ice cube from this mold. 100% Food Grade Silicone molds.
【Wide Temperature Range】The using temperature is -40°C~250°C(-40℉ to 480℉), and it will satisfy most of condition in your kitchen such as refrigerator, microwave oven.
【Keep The Cold Taste for a Long Time】Put the ice ball into your Whiskey, cola, red wine, champagne glass cup
【Design from 3D Movie‘STAR WARS’】 This mold can make a 2.4 inch ‘Death Star’! Great gift for all Star Wars fans!
description: Wllrun’s Star Wars ice cube,which is seamless model manufactured with precise mold design. Please contact us with no hesitation if you need any help from us.

1.you should wash it with tap water. 2.Combine the two parts of cover into a seamless mold.Then you can add liquid to make it into ice. Don't fill the molds all the way, 90% works well and gives the ice/water room to expand.It is more better under fill than over fill.  Distilled water or cooled down boiled water can give you slightly clearer ice. 3.Put it in the refrigerator for about six hours.Then that finish.Make the ice "death star" out and enjoy it.  STAR WARS DEATH STAR ICE CUBE, great gift for all Star Wars fans! We manufacture strictly with preferred food-grade silicone, you can use it.
Dear customer friends,When you are choosing our product,please carefully look for "WllRun" brand. All of other brands with the sale are fake,we cann‘t promise their quality .THANKS.
